description.title: Application Description
description.value: Displays customer, order, and subscription details from Infusionsoft

helpText.title: Help text for subdomain field
helpText.value: Enter only the first part of the subdomain here (for example: 'yourcompany').

helpText.title: API Token from Infusionsoft help text
helpText.value: You can find your Infusionsoft API token in the Infusionsoft Admin settings section

billingAddress.title: App field label for Billing address

dateCreated.title: App field label for Contact created date

email.title: App field label for email address

jobTitle.title: App field label for job title

leadSource.title: App field label for lead source

ownerEmpty.title: App field error if owner not found

date.title: App field label for group date field

empty.title: App field placeholder for when there no tags

title.title: App field label for tag group

empty.title: App field placeholder text when there are no orders

status.title: App field label for order details status

title.title: App field label for order title

total.title: App field label for order total

paid.title: Label displayed next to an order when paid

unpaid.title: Label displayed next to an order when unpaid

billAmount.title: App field label for subscription bill amounts

date.title: App field label for subscription dates

empty.title: App field error for no subscriptions

plan.title: App field label for subscriptions plan

status.title: App field label for subscriptions status

title.title: App field label for subscriptions title

edit.title: App field label for editing contact details

ordersSubscriptionsTitle.title: Title for the orders and subscriptions part

empty.title: App field error for no matches found
empty.value: Could not match this end-user with an Infusionsoft contact. Try searching instead.

generalInformation.title: App field label for General information

more.title: App field label for more link for contacts

create.title: Button to create a contact for the current end-user
create.value: Create a contact for this end-user

limitReached.title: App error message for loading too many tags
limitReached.value: You reached the maximum limit of results to display. Contact Support for additional information.

message.title: Default error message
message.value: There was an error loading contact data. Try again later.

message.title: Error message for incorrect settings/unable to connect to Infusionsoft
message.value: There was an error connecting to Infusionsoft. Ensure that the Subdomain and API token are correct in your settings.

invalid.title: Error message for invalid search criteria

toggle.title: Alt text for Toggle search button

error.title: Error message for failure to add tag if it already has been added
error.value: Failed to add tag to contact. Check to see if you have already added it.

success.title: Success message after adding a tag successfully in Infusionsoft

default.title: Default choice in the add tag dropdown
